AutoFitText Component Demo

Preview

Container: 800px Ã— 400px (padding: 40px)

Controls

Features

  • Shrink-to-fit: Automatically reduces font size to fit text within container
  • Line wrapping: Breaks text into multiple lines when needed
  • Line clamping: Limits maximum number of lines with ellipsis (...)
  • Safe-area handling: Respects padding and container boundaries
  • Alignment: Supports horizontal (left, center, right) and vertical (top, middle, bottom) alignment
  • Overflow detection: Callback when text is truncated
  • Customizable: Font size range, weight, family, colors, and more
